definition.content:

# âœ… Common Dashboard

This dashboard aggregates critical metrics for **$team.value**.

**Purpose:**  

Monitor service health, performance, and key KPIs across environments.

Here are the information: 

**Guidelines:**

- âœ… Check this dashboard first for any alerts or anomalies.

- ðŸ›  If you see an issue, refer to [Runbook](https://your-doc-link).

- ðŸ“ž Contact: **#your_slack_team** on Slack.

---

Environment: **$env.value**

definition.title: CPU and Mem by Kubernetes Objects
Average Target Response Time by ALB
Target Response Time (p99 and p95) by ALB
Application: Request Hits By Http Status (remove)

queries.query: max:aws.rds.write_latency{$env AND $team AND (engine:aurora-mysql* OR engine:mysql)} by {dbclusteridentifier}
queries.name: query1

queries.query: max:aws.rds.read_latency{$env AND $team AND (engine:aurora-mysql* OR engine:mysql)} by {dbclusteridentifier}
queries.name: query2

queries.query: avg:aws.rds.dmllatency{$env AND $team AND (engine:aurora-mysql OR engine:mysql*)} by {dbclusteridentifier}
queries.name: query1

queries.query: avg:aws.rds.commit_latency{$env AND $team AND (engine:aurora-mysql OR engine:mysql*)} by {dbclusteridentifier}
queries.name: query1

queries.query: avg:aws.rds.select_throughput{$env AND $team AND (engine:aurora-mysql* OR engine:mysql)} by {dbinstanceidentifier}.as_count()
queries.name: query1

queries.query: avg:aws.rds.dmlthroughput{$env AND $team AND (engine:aurora-mysql* OR engine:mysql)} by {dbinstanceidentifier}.as_count()
queries.name: query1

definition.title: Total Execution Time by Query (MySQL) (need to integrate dd to mysql)
